name: Meta Moment
description:
I hit the end of Tomodachi Quest, a mini-game inside Tomodachi Life (a Nintendo 3DS game) when I dropped the console and broke the screen, breaking the glass and causing pixel glitches. This struck me as incredibly meta - how likely was it that this was the only time I've ever shattered a screen, and it happened at the end of a mini-game inside of a game where you get to play God? Are we all just Miis inside God's 3DS? I had to take a pic.

Cierra Maher | @CierraShares
1800px x 1349px
